title: In game disconnection
body: During my previous game, I have received a leaver buster. I was logged out during this game due to the state of the server. I was told to contact Support if i had received a leaver buster.

replies.body: You definitely should reach out to our support agents! We want to take a look at these cases one on one to make sure we get all the context of what happened, but it'd be best to do all of that in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). That way we'll be able to see what happened when you were disconnected, and figure out how we can help!
